pages.text: Yeh hai Allah Taalaa tumhara rab! Uss kay siwa koi ibadat kay laeeq nahi her cheez ka peda kerney wala hai to tum uss ki ibadat kero aur woh her cheez ka kaar saaz hai
Uss ko to kissi ki nigah moheet nahi ho sakti aur woh sab nigahon ka moheet ho jata hai aur wohi bara bareek been ba khabar hai

Abb bila shuba tumharay pass tumharay rab ki janib say haq beeni kay zaraye phonch chukay hain so jo shaks dekh ley ga woh apna faeeda keray ga aur jo shaks andha rahey ga woh apna nuksan keray ga aur mein tumhara nigaraan nahi hun
Aur hum iss tor per dalaeel ko mukhtalif pehlooâ€™on say biyan kertay hain takay yeh yun kahen kay aap ney kissi say parh liya hai aur takay hum iss ko danish mandon kay liye khoob zahir ker den
Aap khud iss tareeq per chaltay rahiye jiss ki wahee aap kay rab ki taraf say aap kay pass aaee hai Allah Taalaa kay siwa koi laeeq-e-ibadat nahi aur mushrikeen ki taraf khayal na kijiye
Aur agar Allah Taalaa ko manzoor hota to yeh shirk na kertay aur hum ney aap ko inn ka nigraan nahi banaya. Aur na aap inn per mukhtaar hain

Aur gaali mat do unn ko jin ki yeh log Allah Taalaa ko chor ker ibadat kertay hain kiyon kay phir woh ba-raah-e-jahal hadd say guzar ker Allah Taalaa ki shaan mein gustakhi keren gay hum ney iss tarah her tareeqay walon ko unn ka amal marghoob bana rakha hai. Phir apney rab hi kay pass inn ko jana hai so woh inn ko batla dey ga jo kuch bhi woh kiya kertay thay

Aur inn logon ney qasmon mein bara zor laga ker Allah Taalaa ki qasam khaee kay agar inn kay pass koi nishani aajaye to woh zaroor hi uss per eman ley aayen gay aap keh dijiye kay nishaniyan sab Allah kay qabzay mein hain aur tum ko iss ki kiya khabar kay woh nishaniyan jiss waqt aajayen gi yeh log tab bhi eman na layen gay
Aur hum bhi inn kay dilon ko aur inn ki nigahon ko pher den gay jaisa kay yeh log iss per pehli dafa eman na laye aur hum inn ko inn ki sirkashi mein heyraan rehney den gay
